item.title: 马来西亚央行认为经济增长面临重大障碍
item.description: 马来西亚央行表示，由于酝酿中的全球贸易争端和地缘政治紧张局势威胁到出口，经济增长风险在其货币政策考虑中占据重要位置。【原文：Malaysia’s central bank said growth risks loom large in its monetary policy considerations, as brewing global trade disputes and geopolitical tensions threaten exports.】

item.title: 南非国家电网新增 800 兆瓦容量机组
item.description: 南非国家电力公司将库西勒发电站的一台 800 兆瓦机组并入国家电网，同时不断努力提高发电量并结束计划停电。【原文：South Africa’s state electricity utility added an 800-megawatt unit at the Kusile Power Station to the national grid, amid ongoing efforts to boost generation and bring an end to scheduled outages.】

item.title: PE 公司奥克利资本迅速募集 45 亿欧元旗舰基金
item.description: 奥克利资本公司（Oakley Capital）在六个月内为其旗舰基金筹集了 45 亿欧元（49 亿美元）的资金，打破了艰难的筹资环境。【原文：Oakley Capital has raised €4.5 billion ($4.9 billion) for its flagship fund within six months, defying a tough fundraising environment.】

item.title: 英国将通过减少长期吉尔债券来完善 3,020 亿英镑债券计划
item.description: 英国债务管理办公室预计将于本周三宣布自冠状病毒大流行以来规模最大的一揽子债券销售计划，并将以其历史上最小比例的长期限证券作为甜头。【原文：The UK’s Debt Management Office is expected to announce its largest bond sales package since the coronavirus pandemic on Wednesday, sweetening the offer with the smallest proportion of long-maturity securities in its history.】

item.title: 台湾两年多来首次未达到债券销售目标
item.description: 由于担心唐纳德-特朗普政府的政策，投资者在周一的拍卖会上要求提高收益率，台湾自2022年9月以来首次未能达到发债目标。【原文：Taiwan missed its bond-issuance target for the first time since September 2022 as investors demanded higher yields at an auction Monday due to concern over the policies of Donald Trump’s administration.】

item.title: 亚洲新兴货币走低，关税忧虑扰乱情绪
item.description: 由于投资者权衡美国对该地区经济体征收更多定向关税的影响，亚洲新兴国家的货币与股市一同下跌。政治不确定性继续拖累土耳其里拉。【原文：Currencies in emerging Asia declined along with stocks as investors weighed the fallout of more targeted US tariffs on the region’s economies. Political uncertainty continued to weigh on the Turkish lira.】

item.title: 印度 3 月份经济活动下滑，PMI 指数快报显示
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）的一项即时调查显示，由于制造业的回升被服务业需求的放缓所抵消，印度 3 月份的经济活动略有下滑。【原文：India’s economic activity slipped slightly in March as a pickup in manufacturing was offset by slowing services sector demand, a flash survey by HSBC Holdings Plc showed.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟支持迪拜 OSN 推动中东流媒体发展
item.description: 华纳兄弟探索公司（Warner Bros. Discovery）正在收购总部位于迪拜的 OSN Streaming Ltd. 公司的少数股份，以期在快速增长的中东娱乐市场分一杯羹。【原文：Warner Bros. Discovery is taking a minority stake in Dubai-based OSN Streaming Ltd. in a bid to capture a slice of the fast-growing Middle Eastern entertainment market.】

item.title: 印度房屋销售下降 23%，原因是价格高企、买家谨慎
item.description: 根据房地产数据公司 PropEquity 的报告，由于高房价和经济放缓使购房者变得谨慎，印度九大城市 1-3 月份的住房销售量比去年同期下降了 23%。【原文：Housing sales across India’s top nine cities dropped 23% in the January–March quarter over last year, as high prices and a slowing economy are making buyers cautious, according to a report by real estate data firm PropEquity.】

item.title: 土耳其里拉离岸成本、违约掉期维持在近期高点附近
item.description: 在离岸市场上借入土耳其里拉和为该国债务违约投保的成本维持在上周设定的水平附近，这表明在市场经历了一段疯狂时期之后，交易商们仍然深感焦虑。里拉兑美元汇率下跌。【原文：The costs of borrowing Turkish lira in the offshore market and insuring the country’s debt against default are holding near the levels they set last week, a sign that traders remain deeply on edge after a wild period for the market. The lira dipped against the dollar.】

item.title: 人工智能芯片初创公司 FuriosaAI 拒绝了 Meta 8 亿美元的收购要约
item.description: 一位知情人士透露，韩国芯片初创公司FuriosaAI拒绝了Meta Platforms公司8亿美元的收购要约，而是选择以独立公司的形式发展业务。【原文：Korean chip startup FuriosaAI has turned down an $800 million takeover offer from Meta Platforms Inc., choosing instead to grow the business as an independent company, a person with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 食品和娱乐价格疲软导致新加坡通胀放缓
item.description: 由于食品、娱乐和文化价格上涨放缓，新加坡的主要通胀指标较上月继续放缓。【原文：Singapore’s key inflation gauge continued to ease from the previous month as food, recreation and culture prices slowed.】

item.title: 印度国家证券交易所为其非上市股票交易提供便利
item.description: 印度国家证券交易所有限公司（National Stock Exchange of India Ltd.）将于周一开始通过指定存管机构结算其非上市股票的交易，从而缩短股票买卖流程。【原文：National Stock Exchange of India Ltd. will begin settling trades of its unlisted shares via a designated depository on Monday, shortening the process of buying or selling the stock.】

item.title: 23andMe 启动破产保护程序，联合创始人辞去首席执行官职务
item.description: 23andMe Holding Co. 已在美国启动破产程序，以帮助促成出售。【原文：23andMe Holding Co. has initiated bankruptcy proceedings in the US to help facilitate a sale.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行披露的信息显示澳大利亚就业市场依然紧张
item.description: 澳大利亚储备银行周一公布的一份信息自由披露文件显示，澳大利亚劳动力市场依然紧张，而经济总体需求水平与供应能力之间的差距正在缩小。【原文：Australia’s labor market remains tight while the gap between the level of overall demand in the economy and its capacity to supply is narrowing, according to a Freedom of Information disclosure published by the Reserve Bank on Monday.】

item.title: 凯撒离岸债务计划获香港法院批准
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，违约的中国开发商凯撒集团控股有限公司（Kaisa Group Holdings Ltd.）的离岸重组获得了香港法院的批准，为其继续实施债务计划扫清了障碍。【原文：Defaulted Chinese developer Kaisa Group Holdings Ltd. won a Hong Kong court’s approval for its offshore restructuring, according to people familiar with the matter, clearing the way for it to proceed with its debt plan.】

item.title: 全球投资者在米尔肯会议上大赞中国景气改善
item.description: 全球投资者都看到了对中国情绪好转的迹象，但大型长线基金的回归还需要更多的信念。【原文：Global investors are seeing signs of improving sentiment toward China, though it will take more conviction for big, long-only funds to return.】

item.title: 亚洲信贷市场升温，发行商急于击退关税浪潮
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的下一轮关税措施进入倒计时，引发了亚太地区信贷市场的狂热活动，周一有十多家发行商推销或宣布发行美元债券。【原文：The countdown to US President Donald Trump’s next round of tariffs has fueled a frenzy of activity in Asia Pacific’s credit market, with more than a dozen issuers marketing or announcing dollar bonds on Monday.】

item.title: 经济前景堪忧印尼股市下跌
item.description: 由于投资者对印尼经济前景日益感到不安，印尼股市周一暴跌，延续了此前的颓势。【原文：Indonesia stocks tumbled on Monday, extending a rout as investors grew jittery over the country’s economic outlook.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》：美国施压后马来西亚将收紧英伟达芯片资金流
item.description: 英国《金融时报》援引马来西亚贸易部长的话称，在美国要求马来西亚密切关注可能流入中国的先进半导体之后，马来西亚计划对英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：Malaysia plans tighter controls over the flow of Nvidia Corp.’s chips after the US demanded it keep a closer eye on advanced semiconductors that could potentially make their way to China, the Financial Times cited the trade minister as saying.】

item.title: 前花旗集团亚洲区董事总经理肖在香港起诉银行
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc. ）泛亚执行服务部前主管菲利普-约翰-肖（Philip John Shaw）起诉了这家美国银行，对其在 2019 年 3 月被立即解雇一事提出异议，而在本月早些时候，其他前销售交易员也向该市的就业法庭提出了类似的索赔要求。【原文：Philip John Shaw, a former head of Pan-Asia Execution Services at Citigroup Inc., sued the US bank to contest his summary dismissal in March 2019, after other ex-sales traders filed similar claims with the city’s employment tribunal earlier this month.】

item.title: 詹姆斯-哈迪（James Hardie）在交易消息传出股价下挫前进行看跌交易
item.description: 就在这家澳大利亚建筑产品生产商表示将收购总部位于芝加哥的 AZEK 公司之前，大量看跌 James Hardie Industries Plc 期权易手，导致其股价下挫。【原文：A block of bearish James Hardie Industries Plc options changed hands just before the Australian building-products producer said it would buy Chicago-based AZEK Co., sending its stock sinking.】

item.title: 中国股票基金跑赢 99% 同行 消费者驱动反弹
item.description: 一家规模达 34 亿美元的中国股票基金在 2025 年的表现几乎优于所有同行，该基金的一位经理预计，消费者信心的转好将进一步提振国内股市。【原文：A manager of a $3.4 billion Chinese equity fund that’s outperformed virtually all of its peers in 2025 expects a turnaround in consumer confidence will further boost domestic shares.】

item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 卡尼警告特朗普 "想搞垮我们" 加拿大大选拉开帷幕
item.description: 马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）在竞选之初就严正警告美国总统唐纳德-特朗普想要吞并加拿大是认真的，他开始努力让加拿大人相信他可以保护加拿大免受美国的侵略。【原文：Mark Carney began his bid for election with a stark warning that US President Donald Trump is serious about wanting to annex Canada, launching his effort to convince Canadians he can protect the country from US aggression.】

item.title: 印尼开始向新财富基金转让企业股份
item.description: 印度尼西亚已开始向新成立的主权财富基金 Danantara 转移顶级国有企业的所有权。【原文：Indonesia has started transferring ownership of top state companies to the new sovereign wealth fund Danantara.】

item.title: 特朗普新关税被认为更有分寸，金属走高
item.description: 工业金属攀升，原因是交易商在权衡美国总统唐纳德-特朗普下一轮关税措施的结果，预计这些措施的针对性将强于此前的预期。【原文：Industrial metals climbed as traders weighed the outcome from President Donald Trump’s next round of tariffs, which are expected to be more targeted than previously suggested.】

item.title: 菲律宾证券交易所称周一推迟开市
item.description: 菲律宾证券交易所运营商表示，由于连接问题，该交易所周一的交易被推迟。【原文：Trading on the Philippine Stock Exchange was delayed on Monday due to a connection issue, its operator said.】
